document.discussion_title: Silent disco yoga returns to Melbourne
document.topic_text:
Silent disco yoga returns to Melbourne August 22.2016 4:40 pm Photo: Supplied What’s more hipster than yoga and silent disco? You can groove while you move, listening to disco music through glow-in-the-dark headphones at a coming Melbourne event. Flow After Dark silent disco yoga returns to Melbourne after a successful event in June, which was meant to be a one-off. But organisers have listened to the masses and it’s back. Flow After Dark silent disco yoga August 30, 7-9pm Tickets are $65.95, plus booking fee
Several hundred yogis are expected at the Melbourne Park Function Centre on August 30 to enjoy tunes by DJ James Mack through the Silent Sounds glow-in-the-dark headphones. Australia’s top yoga instructor Kate Kendall will take the 90 minutes of all-level Vinyasa yoga. There will be free samples from Happy Place by Lola Berry , Wild Kombucha , The Clean Treats Factory , Frequency H20 , Golden Grind and Alex and Ani , too. A photo posted by Kate Kendall (@activeyogi) on Aug 2, 2016 at 3:17am PDT
